name: Arena Hero
description: Fight through waves of unique enemies and evolving levels. Altering your character throughout battles in the arena by grabbing upgrades and pickups that change the way you fight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB dedicated VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
